DA> --- In junit@yahoogroups.com, "jain_prabhat" <jain_prabhat@y...> wrote:
>> I am new to J2EE so I might be wrong please let me know.

DA> Turn back while you still have time!  Or at least make sure you don't
DA> jump blindly into the cesspool that is EJB.  

Yes, time doesn't permit me, well anyone, to go into detail here about
the gotchas of EJB, but if you are planning to do any EJB, you should
stop right now and pick up the book 'Bitter EJB.'  It is a very
important read for anyone who is considering it.  It has lots of
hard-won experience written down that you won't find in other books.

Michael Feathers
www.objectmentor.com
